eu_initiatives: Habitat Directive targets and guidelines, Invasive Alien Species EU Regulation
organisation_name: Associazione Teriologica Italiana onlus (Italian Mammal Society) (ATIt)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Federazione Italiana di Scienze della Natura e dell'Ambiente 
http://www.fisna.it/
goals__remit: Missions of the Italian Mammal Society are scientific research promotion, mammals management and conservation, dissemination of knowledge on mammals, collaboration with other national and international associations and/or public body having same goals.
relevant_communication:
ATIt contributed to the monitoring guidelines for reporting obligations following Art. 17 of Habitat Directive published by the Italian Ministry of Environment and ISPRA. 
ATIt has an ongoing collaboration with the Italian Environmental Agency ISPRA for management of invasive alien mammals in Italy following the EU regulation 1143/2014
